column5: For the fisherman and ladies who camp out under the stars whether in a tent or camper fry their own fish bring their own boat and wait on themselves--was wondering how the fishing is on the mighty PIPESTONE during the hot of summer. Also anyone know of Paul HOWARTH who works for the MNR out of Pickle Lake I met him a year ago last spring he was telling me about the big spec he caught and gave me his e-mail addy but was never able to contact him incorrect address. len at clare, michigan almost 1200 miles one way to this fishery and worth it every mile.
